title: Serum miRNA and Metabolomic Signatures of Residential Radon Exposure in Chiang Mai, Thailand.
abstract: Residential radon is a leading environmental cause of lung cancer, but circulating biomarkers linking home exposure to pathogenic biology are not well defined. We conducted an exposure-contrast study in Hang Dong District, Chiang Mai, measuring indoor radon in 48 homes and enrolling adults from <50 Bq/m
